title: Incorrect suggestion location for import with outer attribute at top of file

labels.name: C-enhancement
labels.description: Category: An issue proposing an enhancement or a PR with one.

labels.name: A-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: Messages for errors, warnings, and lints

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
E.g.,

```rust
#[derive(Clone, Debug)] // this is line 1 in this file
pub struct Service;

pub struct Response<T> where T: Bar { pub item: T }
```

gives

```
error[E0405]: cannot find trait `Bar` in this scope                                                                                       
 --> src/main.rs:4:33                                                                                                                     
  |                                                                                                                                       
4 | pub struct Response<T> where T: Bar { pub item: T }                                                                                   
  |                                 ^^^ not found in this scope                                                                           
help: possible candidate is found in another module, you can import it into scope                                                         
  |                                                                                                                                       
2 | use crate::foo::Bar; 
```

Note that line 2 is between the derive and the the struct.

Moved from https://github.com/rust-lang-nursery/rls/issues/1085
